group_1.textLeft: Sakurako disappeared?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, she left yesterday and never came back...
Nemu says she's still safe, but...

group_1.textLeft: Well, at least that's a relief...

group_1.textRight: Do you have any idea where Sakurako might be?

group_1.textLeft: Is she not at the Uwasa Aquarium?

group_1.textRight: That was the first place I checked, but she@wasn't there...

group_1.textLeft: If she's not at her [textBlue:Rumor], then I@don't know...
She probably wouldn't go to school...
...Would you like us to look around?
Even if you don't have any ideas, the more@people you have searching, the better.

group_1.textRight: Thank you... Sorry for the trouble...

group_1.textLeft: Well, I don't know what to do... I don't know@where to look...

group_1.textRight: ...The only place I can think of is the Uwasa@Aquarium...

group_1.textLeft: ...You might be right, maybe she's hiding@there and sulking.
Didn't she seem a little off when they started@talking about the ocean?

group_1.textRight: ...they only talked about the ocean instead of@the Uwasa Aquarium?

group_1.textLeft: Everyone was just worried about her.
They weren't trying to be dismissive of the@Uwasa Aquarium, but...
Maybe she took it as "they didn't have fun"?
I'd react like you, too, but...
Sakurako has a unique way of thinking...
How should I put it... She interprets things in@ways you wouldn't expect.
Although that's just what makes her Sakurako.

group_1.textRight: We should pop by the Uwasa Aquarium!
If we tell her that it was super fun, maybe@she'll come out!

group_1.textLeft: I agree.

group_1.textRight: Should we call Iroha and the others too?

group_1.textLeft: ...Nah, we're not sure yet. Let's check it out on@our own first.
It'd be a waste of everyone's time if she wasn't@there.

group_1.textRight: We still need to look everywhere else, after all...

group_1.textLeft: However, I may need to borrow a prop.
Ui's picture diary.
It's important to have proof that everyone had@fun, right?
